data.name: Terraria Wiki - fixed header and tweaks
data.description: This basically keeps the search box always on the screen, even after scrolling. It also expands most of the side bar panels, and hides a few things I find useless like the gamepedia top bar, footers, site notices, language picker, and sharing tab.

data.name: Tou.tv Sombre (Dark Mode) + Tweaks
data.description: Couleur plus sombre pour le site de tou.tv avec fix de bordure en plein écran et autres ajustements

data.name: Radio Canada Sombre (Dark Mode)
data.description: Site d'actualité de Radio Canada en couleur sombre

data.name: Tutanota Plata Noir (Unofficial) Dark theme
data.description:
Dark Tutanota theme based on the Plata Noir GTK theme

This theme is not in any way affiliated with the Plata project.

data.name: Dark-GitLab
data.description: Dark theme for GitLab and self-hosted instances. Also supports far greater color customization, custom dark and light color-schemes and many custom features in UserCSS format at GitLab.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

data.name: YouTube :: Red n Dark Theme. Deep Black Style.
data.description:
YouTube :: Red 'n Dark Theme :: Black Style :: No sign in required

A working Dark YouTube style with the original red.

• No image ADS (images) and some new text ads (2020)
• Initially designed for those who never sign-in (not giving away their information)
• Easy on the eyes
• Continuous development
• Always ON  (to avoid switch to dark every time you enter YouTube)

Included the **COVID-19 / Coronavirus** notification banner in the theme. Sorry but I think that this banner is important and won't be removed.

Any questions / issues / bugs / suggestions, write in comments below with a description. 
Education is always appreciated. 
Visit my other styles if you wish.

THANKS FOR 1400+ DOWNLOADS! ENJOY!!

user.name: rash!
user.about: Engineer. Audio & Video editor. Voice over artist.

data.name: Eurogamer Dark with Major Fixes and Changes
Ravelry Dark Mode
data.description:
A dark mode for ravelry.com, with the text changed for readability.

Mostly meant as a temporary solution until Ravelry releases their own dark mode.

data.name: Helix Swarm Dark
data.description: A dark theme for Helix (Perforce) Swarm. Tested on Swarm 2019.3.

data.name: DrooDark 2.0
